backend/main.mo: Implements change request submission and admin review with access control using a map-based store and authorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in the UI and data structure.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes, applying background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry bootstrapping theme from localStorage before React loads and mounting the app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes the full single-page layout by rendering all major site sections and global components.
frontend/src/components/aqi/AQIGuide.tsx: Renders an interactive AQI category guide with tabs, alerts, and category-specific health information.
frontend/src/components/diseases/Conditi: Displays a health condition card with symptoms and protective steps using shared UI components.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with quick links, branding, smooth-scroll navigation, and dynamic UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with desktop and mobile navigation, smooth-scrolling links, and a theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: Button that switches between light and dark themes using icons and a custom theme hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopRightC: Fixed corner label displaying site creator credit.
frontend/src/components/reviews/StarRati: Displays a star-based rating with filled and unfilled icons and a text summary.
frontend/src/components/sections/AQICate: Section introducing AQI categories with description text and an embedded AQI guide component.
frontend/src/components/sections/AQIFore: Interactive AQI forecast section with state and district selectors and dynamically loaded forecast data.
frontend/src/components/sections/Disease: Section describing health impacts of air pollution with a disclaimer and condition cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with title, description, call-to-action buttons, and a background image.
frontend/src/components/sections/IndoorA: Indoor air quality action plan section outlining key areas and practical steps to reduce indoor pollution.
frontend/src/components/sections/LongTer: Explains long-term health effects of air pollution with detailed impact cards and protective strategies.
frontend/src/components/sections/Prevent: Displays a prevention tips section with multiple cards listing actionable indoor, outdoor, and mask-related air quality tips.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Renders a projects showcase with filterable bike and car silencer projects, including descriptions, impacts, and images.
frontend/src/components/sections/Request: Provides a form for authenticated users to submit change requests with optional section selection and contact info.
frontend/src/components/sections/ReviewB: Shows a review box card containing a title, description, and a static five‑star rating component.
frontend/src/components/sections/Symptom: Presents emergency warning signs and common pollution‑related symptoms using alerts and informational cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/VideosS: Displays deduplicated Hindi and English educational videos using responsive embedded video cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Vulnera: React section displaying vulnerable groups with alerts, icons, descriptions, and protective guidance lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIsA: React section explaining AQI, what it measures, why it matters, pollution sources, and the AQI scale.
frontend/src/content/aqiCategories.ts: Exports AQI category definitions with ranges, colors, descriptions, health risks, and recommended actions.
frontend/src/content/conditions.ts: Defines health conditions affected by pollution with symptoms, risks, and protective steps.
frontend/src/content/indiaStatesDistrict: Dataset listing Indian states and union territories with their districts.
frontend/src/content/stateAqiForecast.ts: Contains AQI data and forecasts for Indian states plus helpers for computing categories and generating fallback data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing and exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend-related React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitChangeReques: Provides a mutation to submit change requests through the backend actor and invalidate cached queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Handles light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and class-based application.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, requirements, and current state.
